issue.title: [C++] FixedSizeBinaryBuilder::Append lacks "const char*" overload
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2402](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2402). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This implies that calling `FixedSizeBinaryBuilder::Append` with a "const char\*" argument currently instantiates a temporary `std::string`.
